src_original: Wal_8.9 prādur babhūva magadheṣu pūrvaṁ dharmo hy aśuddhaḥ samalānubuddhaḥ /
tgt_original: 「『先此摩竭界，　　常說雜穢法。

src_original: avavṛṇīṣva amṛtasya dvāraṁ vadasva dharmaṁ virajānubuddham // Wal_8.10 atha bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe /
tgt_original: 願開甘露門，　　為演純淨義！

src_original: gaṁbhīram anudurdṛśam / na drakṣyanti rāgāraktās tamaḥskandhena nivṛtāḥ // Wal_8.13 saṁti bhadanta satvāḥ loke jātā loke vṛddhās tīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā
tgt_original: 惟願今普眼，　　亦敷法堂教！ 眾生沒憂惱，　　不離生老死，

src_original: api svākārāḥ suvineyā alparajasaḥ alparajaskajātīyāh ye aśravaṇād dharmasya parihīyaṁte / deśayatu bhagavāṁ dharmaṁ deśayatu sugato dharmaṁ bhavisyaṁti dharmaratnasyājñātāraḥ /
tgt_original: 然多樂善者，　　願說戰勝法！

src_original: Wal_8.14 atha bhagavata etad abhavad yanv aham svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṁ vyavalokayeyaṁ Wal_8.15 adrākṣīd bhagavāṁ svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṁ vyavalokayaṁ saṁti satvā loke jātāḥ
tgt_original: 』「爾時世尊默然受之，即以佛眼普觀世間，見諸眾生根有利鈍：

src_original: Wal_11.3 adrākṣuḥ paṁcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantaṁ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar anyonyaṁ saṁpratasthur kriyākāraṁś cākāṛsuḥ /
tgt_original: 五人遙見佛來，共作要言：

src_original: Wal_11.4 ayaṁ sa bhavanta śramaṇo gautama āgacchati śaithiliko bāhuliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāntaḥ sa etarhi audārikaṁ cāhāram āhārayati odanakunmāsaṁ sarpistailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayati
tgt_original: 『瞿曇沙門昔日食一麻、一米，尚不得道； 今既多欲，去道遠矣！

src_original: sukhodakena ca kāyaṁ pariṣiṁcati / Wal_11.5 so ’smābhir upasaṁkrāṁto nābhivādayitavyo na vanditavyaḥ notthāyāsanenopanimaṁtrayitavyaḥ anyatra prāg evāsanāni prajñapya evaṁ syād vacanīyah / saṁvidyante āyuṣmaṁ gautama āsanāni saced ākāṁkṣasi niṣīdasva /
tgt_original: 但為敷一小座，慎莫起迎，禮拜問訊！

src_original: Wal_11.6 yathā yathā bhagavāṁ paṁcakāṁ bhikṣūṁ darśanāyopasaṁkrāmati tathā tathā pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ śriyaṁ ca tejaś ca gauravaṁ cāsahamānā utthāyāsanād ekatyā bhagavato ’rthāyāsanaṁ prajñapayaṁti ekatyāḥ pādodakaṁ pādādhiṣṭhānam ekānte upanikṣipaṁti ekatyāś cīvarakāṇi
tgt_original: 』世尊既到，五人不覺起禮，為捉衣鉢，更敷好座，以水洗足； 然猶輕如來，面呼姓名：

src_original: pratigṛhṇaṁti evaṁ cāhur niṣīdatāṁ bhavāṁ gautamaḥ prajñapta evāsane /

Wal_11.7 atha bhagavata etad abhavac cyutā bateme mohapuruṣāḥ svasmāt kriyākārād iti viditvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat / Wal_11.8 tatredānīṁ paṁcakā bhikṣavo bhagavaṁtam atyarthaṁ nāmavādena gotravādenāyuṣmadvādena samudācaraṁti / Wal_11.9 tatra bhagavāṁ paṁcakāṁ bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayate sma mā yūyaṁ bhikṣavas tathāgataṁ nāmavādena gotravādenāyuṣmadvādena samudācarata /
Wal_11.10 tat kasmād dhetor yaḥ kaścid bhikṣavaḥ tathāgatam atyarthaṁ nāmavādena gotravādenāyuṣmadvādena samudācarati tat tasya bhavati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya /
tgt_original: 『汝等愚癡立要，云何而不牢固？ 汝莫輕於佛，面稱姓名，自使長夜受大苦報！

src_original: Wal_11.11 ta evam āhus tayā tāvat tvam āyuṣmaṁ gautama pūrvikayā īryayā caryayā duṣkaracaryayā na kiṁcid adhigatavān uttaraṁ manuṣyadharmam alamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṁ jñānaṁ vā darśanaṁ
tgt_original: 吾今已成無上正覺，應共一心聽受教誡，汝若隨順無違無逆，不久當得族姓出家，淨修梵行，現證道果！ 生死已盡，梵行已立，所作已作，解了五陰，止宿泥洹。 』五人復言：

src_original: vā sparśavihāratāṁ ca / kutaḥ punar yas tvam etarhi śaithiliko bāhuliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāṁtaḥ sa tvam etarhy audārikam cāhāram āhārayasi odanakunmāsaṁ sarpistailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayasi sukhodakena ca kāyaṁ pariṣiñcasi /
tgt_original: 『卿先如是難行苦行，尚不得過人法，聖利滿足！ 況今失道，放恣多欲，過人之法，其可得乎！

src_original: Wal_11.12 atha bhagavāṁ paṁcakām bhikṣūn idam avocat / nanu yūyaṁ bhikṣavaḥ paśyatha tathāgatasya pūrveṇāparaṁ mukhasya vā viprasannatvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraham / Wal_11.13 āma bho gautama /
tgt_original: 』佛復告曰： 『汝等莫輕如來無上正覺，佛不失道，亦不多欲！ 』五人聞已，乃捨本心。 佛復告曰：

src_original: Wal_11.14 dvāv imau bhikṣavaḥ antau pravrajitena na sevitavyau na bhajitavyau na paryupāsitavyau
yaś ca kāmeṣu kāmasukhalikānuyogo hīno grāmyaḥ prākṛtaḥ pārthagjanikaḥ / yaś cātmaklamathānuyogaḥ duḥkhaḥ anāryaḥ anarthopasaṁhitaḥ ity /
tgt_original: 一者、貪著愛欲，說欲無過； 二者、邪見苦形，無有道迹。

src_original: Wal_11.15 etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya asti madhyamā pratipac cakṣuṣkaraṇī jñānakaraṇī upaśamakaraṇi upaśamasaṁvarttanī abhijñāyai saṁbodhaye nirvāṇāya saṁvartate /
tgt_original: 捨此二邊，便得中道，生眼智明覺，向於泥洹。

src_original: Wal_11.16 madhyamā pratipat katamā / āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgas tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭjiḥ samyaksaṁkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksṁrtiḥ samyaksamādhir evāṣṭamaḥ /
